feed.title: Docmost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Individual page export in Markdown and HTML formats by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/80

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.4...v0.2.5

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

You can now import Markdown and HTML pages (by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/85). In case you missed it, we introduced individual page exports in the v0.2.5.

Other changes

  • add STMP_SECURE and changed auth config by @olivierIllogika in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/81

New Contributors

  • @olivierIllogika made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/81

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.5...v0.2.7

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: make page imports better (by @Philipinho)
  • fix: enhance page exports
  • fix: generate ydoc state during page import to prevent duplicate nodes on the editor
  • fix editor placeholder bug
  • fix: only workspace owners can assign owner role by @olivierIllogika in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/108
  • other minor bug fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.7...v0.2.8

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Following the recently released v0.2.8, this release aims to fix the markdown import error experienced by some users.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.8...v0.2.9

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.2.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: editor formatting by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.2.9...v0.2.10
